metadata.title: CVE-2019-5429 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Untrusted search path in FileZilla before 3.41.0-rc1 allows an attacker togain privileges via a malicious 'fzsftp' binary in the user's homedirectory.

criterions.comment: filezilla: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
